description: With the fallout of Chidgey and Natalee’s relationship affecting the whole house the girls and boys decide to go their separate ways. The boys stay in Cardiff while the girls go wild in the Valleys. Good looking boys are not the only thing to be brought back to the city and all is revealed at a bo-peep party. Liam’s DJing surprises Jordan and AK calls in the professionals. Work is the last thing on Leeroy’s mind when he spends a night in the Cwtch. However the chance of a dream job is not enough to stop Lateysha from calling it quits.
